fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.classifier.transductive

Class S3VMLightSGDQN

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.classifier.transductive.S3VMLightSGDQN
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransductiveClassifier<double[]>

    public class S3VMLightSGDQN
extends java.lang.Object
implements TransductiveClassifier<double[]>
    Fast Linear transductive SVM using a combination of SVMLight and SGDQN algorithms.
    Author:
    picard
